column5: 2 min easy access to Grand Parkway and I-10 Freeway, West Park Tollway, 7 mins to Katy Mills Mall & Walmart, 44 mins into Downtown Houston, 35 mins to NRG Reliant; 42 via I-10 Katy Frwy; Krogers around the corner, plenty of eating restaurants. This is a good location to be comfortable with your environment and conveniently get wherever you want to go. Complimentary amentities and features include, breakfast groceries, detergent, soap, shampoo & conditioner, etc. Driver available reasonable fee
column8: Comfortable Superbowl Home Away from Home!
